title: Unfair

embed.description: スクリーンショットやGIF動画、ウェブサイトを簡単に共有できます。あらゆる情報を素早く簡単に、そして分かりやすく共有することで皆が幸せに。

body:
That link shows that my game glitched
I got banned aswell
So unfair.
https://gyazo.com/136b14759e62c64f94f28081acf232ab , Again

replies.body:
You can run a quick repair through the client options just in case some of the game files are damaged, but issues like the one in your screenshot are most often attributed to some issues within your network. 

Basically, that champion select lobby needs to communicate with our servers to figure out what champions you actually own and can pick from. If your network isn't able to grab that information, then you see this blank screen and your time runs out. Double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that might be blocking your network like firewalls or antivirus, but hit me back if that doesn't help. Be sure to test those changes in a custom game!
